text:
Company Background:
Kelly, Bentley and Jones is a reputable consulting firm specializing in providing comprehensive business solutions. With a commitment to fostering diversity and inclusion, we strive to create a balanced and dynamic workforce.

Job Type:
Full-Time

Job Description:
We are looking for a dedicated Timekeeping Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will play an essential role in managing timekeeping systems, ensuring accurate tracking of employee hours, and supporting payroll processes.

Responsibilities:
- Maintain and manage the timekeeping system
- Ensure accurate tracking and recording of employee working hours
- Assist in payroll processing by providing accurate timekeeping data
- Resolve any timekeeping discrepancies and respond to employee inquiries
- Generate timekeeping reports and provide insights to management

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field
- Proven experience as a Timekeeping Specialist or similar role
- Proficiency in timekeeping software and MS Office Suite
- Strong attention to detail and excellent organizational skills
- Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary: We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $70,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- Generous paid time off and holidays
- Professional development and training opportunities
- A supportive and inclusive work environment

Kelly, Bentley and Jones actively seeks to employ more women in leadership roles and is committed to enhancing our team diversity. We encourage applications from high-achieving women who are ready to make a significant impact on our team.
